<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vial of the Immortal Wellspring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1655)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Contract" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=329" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 165</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

At a wellspring, you gave your blood to a force of nature and received a vial from the wellspring's heart in return. Once per 10 minutes, when your [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) value would increase above 3, you instead become [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) and are no longer dying; this doesn't prevent you from being killed by [death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7) effects or the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) condition. Once per day, from any distance, the entity that holds your _bargained contract_ can possess you and control your actions, leaving you unaware of what goes on. This possession automatically succeeds, regardless of any countermeasures you might take. Normally this lasts for only 1 round if during an encounter, or no longer than a few minutes during exploration. However, the more you rely on the power of the wellspring's heart to survive death, the longer it can possess you the next time it chooses to do so, doubling the amount of time with each use, to a maximum duration of 1 day. Once the entity possesses you, this duration resets.
